programme.title: The First 48 - Mr. New Orleans/ No Shelter
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 4 New Orleans Homicide works the stabbing death of an infamous local criminal. In Minneapolis, a squabble amongst friends leaves a woman brutally murdered in a bus station.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Romance/ Out of Control
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 5 In Minneapolis, when a young Somali girl is executed in bed, Sergeants Charlie Adams and Chris Thomsen uncover a secret relationship that may have turned deadly.

programme.title: The First 48 - A Fighting Chance
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 7 When an argument at a local bar ends with a young social activist shot sixteen times, Tulsa Detective Ronnie Leatherman searches for answers in a divided community.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Other Wife
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 10 When a father is gunned down protecting his wife in Kansas City, Detectives hope his ex-wife knows who wanted him dead.

programme.title: The First 48 - Love Hate/ A Soldier's Life
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 11 In Tulsa, a young woman goes on the run when her boyfriend is murdered. In Atlanta, an army veteran is gunned down after helping a homeless man.

programme.title: The First 48 - A Man's Game
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 12 In Atlanta, when a young man is shot and left to die in the bushes, a mysterious white Town Car will be the key to Detective Calvin Thomas's investigation.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The New Suspect
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A new hunt for the mysterious Zodiac Killer gains unprecedented access to files, unearthing a complicated cypher that may contain the killer's name, and links between the Zodiac Killer and an unsolved case.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Military Connection
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The hunt uncovers clues that the Zodiac Killer may have served in the U.S. Armed Forces, as the team's supercomputer identifies strange symbols.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - A New Code Uncovered
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 The hunt uncovers a mysterious new cipher related to the Zodiac Killer, while the team's supercomputer uncovers a strange lunar pattern linking the killings. A taunting riddle by the killer may lead to a body. A second prime suspect emerges.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Secret FBI Files
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 The hunt goes into high-gear as the FBI releases secret files on the mysterious Zodiac Killer.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Code is Cracked
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Sal and Ken investigate San Francisco, the epicenter of the Zodiac Killer murders, as the Code Team announces extraordinary news.

programme.title: The First 48 - Taken
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 2 When a young man and his pregnant fiance are executed after a failed ransom attempt, Atlanta Homicide will stop at nothing to identify the elusive suspect.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The New Suspect
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A new hunt for the mysterious Zodiac Killer gains unprecedented access to files, unearthing a complicated cypher that may contain the killer's name, and links between the Zodiac Killer and an unsolved case.

programme.title: The Hunt for the Zodiac Killer - The Military Connection
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 The hunt uncovers clues that the Zodiac Killer may have served in the U.S. Armed Forces, as the team's supercomputer identifies strange symbols.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - The Boogie Man
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Two young children witness the gruesome murder of their mother.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Friendly Fire
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Rod must locate the body of a missing sailor in order to find his murderer.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Looking for Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 A chance meeting goes terribly awry for a good-natured Vietnam vet.

programme.title: The First 48 - Late Night Ambush/Fire & Fury
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 15 In Tulsa, a father is gunned down in a parking lot by a killer lying in wait. In Mobile, an elderly man dies from a suspicious fire in his apartment.

programme.title: The First 48 - Life Interrupted/Lucifer
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 16 In Atlanta, a young man comes home for lunch and winds up murdered when he catches a brazen thief in the act. Then, in Tulsa, an ongoing feud between two gang members leads to a fateful encounter.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Stolen Lives/Crimson Trail
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 In Miami, Florida, 25-year-old Pedro Roteta is stabbed in the middle of the street and left to die. Despite video of the murder and a confession the defense attempts to get immunity based on the controversial "Stand Your Ground" law.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Devil Inside / Flight Risk
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 After a woman's dismembered body is found beneath an overpass in Tucson, Arizona, the suspect reveals a disturbing dark side.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Bad Attitude
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 After an unidentified man's stabbed body is found in a vacant Dallas, Texas apartment, two suspects both admit to setting up the man for robbery--and blame each other for the murder.

programme.title: After the First 48 - No Return
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 A beloved father of three is gunned down outside his home in Atascocita, Texas, during a robbery gone wrong. Investigators catch a lucky break with a surprise piece of evidence.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Con Artist Killers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Mother and son grifters crisscross the United States, pulling off every scam and con imaginable but when these criminal masterminds graduate to multiple homicides, they’re finally caught.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - A Woman Scorned
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 A promising young attorney is shot and killed in a jealous rage by an obsessed, on-again-off-again girlfriend. But can she convince the jury that she’s the victim and get away with murder?

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - A Wolf in Woman's Clothing
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 The murder of a millionaire doctor’s wife sets off a massive manhunt throughout New England.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Doctor Death
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 For more than a decade, a genius doctor with a homicidal hobby gets away with murder at hospitals across two continents.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Psychic Sleuth
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 29 The head of a family-run maple syrup business disappears, and a psychic claims she's buried somewhere in the sugar shack.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Sweet Transvestite
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 30 A plastic surgeon's wife disappears, and police eventually uncover a body behind a video arcade and a Tickle Trunk worthy of blackmail and murder.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - The Luchalooters
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 Celebrity little people and twin wrestlers Jorge and Miguel have a larger-than-life appetite for drugs and alcohol. And when they're both found dead after a wild night of partying, an autopsy reveals the culprit is eye drops.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Love Bites
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 43 A popular teenage girl is found brutally stabbed to death in her car in a small Pennsylvania city. She wasn’t sexually assaulted, but as police look closer, they discover she was involved in a shocking love triangle that breaks all the rules.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Whales, God, and Pepto Bismol
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 The mid '80s saw three directors of note helm STAR TREK features; Leonard Nimoy came back to save the whales in Trek's biggest hit, followed by William Shatner, and the return of Nicholas Meyer for the original crew's final adventure!

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Queue for Q
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In 1987 Paramount decided Trek should return to its roots - television. ST: The Next Generation would become the first hour-long scripted show sold directly to the syndicated television market. Paramount's gamble paid off. Who hasn't heard of Picard?

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Dancing with Syndication in the Pale Moonlight
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 After Gene Roddenberry's death, Trek ventured into yet another incarnation. Deep Space Nine was different from its predecessor, set on a space station. Its 1993 debut featured an African American Captain and heavily serialized story arcs - both firsts.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Voyage(r) to the Delta Quadrant
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 1995 brought another Trek series. This one featured a new starship, a return to episodic storytelling, and Trek's first female Captain, Kathryn Janeway. It was also the flagship for Paramount's new television network, United Paramount Network (UPN).

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Starships A-Z
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Kirk, Spock, Picard, Data - the list of great Trek characters is incomplete without the Enterprise, Starfleet's flagship vessel. But Enterprise isn't alone - there's a whole list of Federation vessels that aren't appreciated enough.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - It's Been A Long Time…
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 Plagued by fledgling UPN's underperformance, Enterprise's premise (a prequel about the Federation's founding) was undercut by the decision to make the third season a reaction to 9/11. Lackluster ratings meant it would only get four seasons.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Lucy Loves Trek
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 It all began when Gene Roddenberry convinced Desilu to foot the bill for not one, but two Star Trek pilots. Thanks to Desilu's boss - America's darling Lucille Ball - the world met Kirk, Spock, and McCoy.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Saturday Morning Pinks
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Didn't realize there was a cartoon version of Star Trek in the early 70s? Not only was it great, but with original series creator Gene Roddenberry, writer D.C. Fontana, and the series' original stars on board, it is the fourth season of the original show.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Trekking through the '70s - Phase II and The Motion Picture
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Paramount wanted to launch a fourth network with the new Star Trek series Phase II as its flagship. When the network proved unworkable, Phase II appeared doomed - until Star Wars and Close Encounters Of The Third Kind proved box office hits.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Trek Goes To The Movies
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 The 1980s saw Paramount release three linked Star Trek movies to huge box-office success.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Whales, God, and Pepto Bismol
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 The mid '80s saw three directors of note helm STAR TREK features; Leonard Nimoy came back to save the whales in Trek's biggest hit, followed by William Shatner, and the return of Nicholas Meyer for the original crew's final adventure!

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Queue for Q
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In 1987 Paramount decided Trek should return to its roots - television. ST: The Next Generation would become the first hour-long scripted show sold directly to the syndicated television market. Paramount's gamble paid off. Who hasn't heard of Picard?

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Dancing with Syndication in the Pale Moonlight
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 After Gene Roddenberry's death, Trek ventured into yet another incarnation. Deep Space Nine was different from its predecessor, set on a space station. Its 1993 debut featured an African American Captain and heavily serialized story arcs - both firsts.

programme.title: The Center Seat: 55 Years of Star Trek - Voyage(r) to the Delta Quadrant
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 1995 brought another Trek series. This one featured a new starship, a return to episodic storytelling, and Trek's first female Captain, Kathryn Janeway. It was also the flagship for Paramount's new television network, United Paramount Network (UPN).

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - A Game of Pool
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Championship pool player Fats Brown returns from the grave for one last game.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Mirror
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 After a poor but ambitious Central American farm worker overthrows his country's tyrannical leader, he believes he sees assassins everywhere. A look in the mirror reveals his most dangerous enemy.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Grave
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 Before he died, notorious gunslinger Pinto Sykes put a curse on hired-gun Conny Miller. Miller returns to town and is challenged to visit the grave of Sykes, despite the curse.

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear - The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mines - The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mild-mannered scholar Flynn Carson, chosen to recover and protect priceless historical artifacts from around the world, must travel to the mysterious bayous of New Orleans to find the ancient Judas Chalice

programme.title: The Librarian: The Curse of the Judas Chalice - The Librarian: The Curse of the Judas Chalice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a brilliant student takes a job at the New York Public Library, he learns it actually involves safeguarding ancient mystic and historical treasures secretly warehoused there, protecting them from the forces of evil.

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear - The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: RoboCop: The Series - 101 - The Future of Law Enforcement
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 RoboCop is back to provide justice in Delta City. While investigating the murders of several homeless people, he uncovers some of the city's darker secrets.

programme.desc: Season 1, FailArmy celebrates all the weird uncles, strange cousins and black sheep that make getting together for the holidays such a trip.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Maneuvers
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 The theft of a transporter module by Kazon forces thrusts Chakotay into an explosive confrontation with his traitorous former lover Seska.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Resistance
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 Janeway must escape from a city under siege by the Mokra, a brutal regime determined to crush the growing resistance movement against it.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Prototype
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 After Torres reactivates a humanoid robot, she's drawn into a war between robotic enemies.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Alliances
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 14 Hoping to strengthen Voyager's strategic position in the quadrant, Janeway reluctantly seeks an alliance with the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Threshold
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Paris makes history by becoming the first person to cross the transwarp threshold, but could pay for the achievement with his life.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Meld
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 16 Unable to come up with a logical motive for a shipboard murder, Tuvok performs a mind-meld with the perpetrator that brings out Tuvok's "killer instinct."

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Dreadnought
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 Torres races against time to stop a deadly self-guided missile on a collision course with disaster.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Death Wish
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 A rebel Q escapes from incarceration and demands asylum on Voyager so he can commit suicide.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Lifesigns
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 The Doctor falls in love with a Vidiian woman stricken by the deadly Phage.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Investigations
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Neelix helps smoke out the crewmember who has been passing Federation secrets to the Kazon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Deadlock
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A space anomaly generates a duplicate Voyager and crew, but only one ship can survive an assault by Vidiian invaders.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Innocence
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 22 After crash-landing on a moon, Tuvok encounters three terrified children who claim they've been brought there to die.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Thaw
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 23 Thanks to a complex sensory system controlled by a computer, Kim and others are literally held hostage by fear.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Tuvix
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 24 A bizarre occurrence during transport causes Tuvok and Neelix to fuse into one alien humanoid known as "Tuvix."

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 5 This episode includes: Baron 52 Crew, UD: Mary & Martha and Stamper's Rampage & UD

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 18
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 18 This episode includes: Mother's Instinct, Temple President Murder, Swoops & Squats & UD, Grady's Bible and Rapist MD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 13 This episode includes: Newlywed Escape & UD, Gettysburg Ghosts, Trucker Disappearance & UD and Magic, the Gathering.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 3
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 This episode includes: Amnesia & UD, Carlucci & UD, Math Teacher Escape & UD and Beale's Cypher.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 13
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 13 This episode includes: Electric Lady, Murder Premonition and James Van Praagh, Pts. 1 & 2.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 This episode includes: Robin Hood Rabbi & UD, Missing In-Laws & UD, To Madame with Love and Deadly Dumpster

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 1
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 1 This episode includes: Zodiac/Unabomber & UD, UD: Newsman's Lost Love, Missing College Kids & UD, Trish's Miracle and Picture Taking Fugitive.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 21
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 21 This episode includes: Dennis Cole's Son, UD: Train Wreck Amnesia, Newsman's Lost Love & UD, Amish Hostage Murder & UD and Plateau Vision.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 17
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 17 This episode includes: SADD Fugitive, Nazca Lines, Where's Charlotte? and The Entity.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 19
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 19 This episode includes: Drug Playboy & UD, Mrs. Rogers, Philip's Angel & UD, Memphis Kidnap Progress Report, UD: She Sold Babies and Pizza Bandits.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 9 This episode includes: Bee Sting Healing, Ranger Bombing Target, UD: Looking for Christopher, Preppie Rape Mistrial & UD and 911 Call for Help.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 11
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 11 This episode includes: Doggie Bowser MD, UD: College Student Murders, Furniture Store Shoot Out, Pts. 1 & 2 and Kurt Cobain.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 4
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 4 This episode includes: Bad Chief, Locust Grove, Update: Pizza Man and Perpetual Partners.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 14
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 This episode includes: Death by Drowning, Update: Sweetheart Escape, Grandma's Grave and CIA Secrets.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 20 A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Klan leader Sam Bowers goes on trial for ordering the murder of an African-American storeowner 32 years prior, and investigators reopen the unsolved case of an African-American truck driver who was forced to leap to his death from a bridge by Klan member

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 13 Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 17 A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: MST3K: Teen-Age Strangler - MST3K: Teen-Age Strangler
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mike and the 'bots watch the dreary educational short Is This Love? (1957) and the horrifyingly bad Teenage Strangler (1964).

programme.title: MST3K: Teenage Caveman - MST3K: Teenage Caveman
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 In Teenage Cave Man (1958), a rebellious cave boy goes against clan rules and wants to explore horizons beyond the river

programme.title: MST3K: Teenagers From Outer Space - MST3K: Teenagers From Outer Space
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A group of aliens land on Earth and decide to use the planet as a farm for their livestock. One of the aliens rebels and flees to a small town, where he is pursued by another alien who kills anyone in his path.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: The Selling Wizard
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 The Satellite of Love crew take on a short about grocery store freezers.

programme.title: MST3K: Fugitive Alien - MST3K: Fugitive Alien
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.

programme.title: MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus - MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A multinational team of astronauts heads to Venus, but finds a world destroyed by nuclear war.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary - Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: MST3K: Robot Wars - MST3K: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch ROBOT WARS (1993). A new SOL is introduced and a new Gizmonic tech arrives.

programme.title: MST3K: Bride Of The Monster - MST3K: Bride Of The Monster
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.

programme.title: Good Witch - How to Say 'I Love You!'
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 Hallmark Original Series. The town is caught up in romance when Cassie helps Ben find an old film.

programme.title: Good Witch - A Birthday Wish
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Hallmark Original Series. When a visiting chef is unable to relax, Cassie arranges for a day at the stove.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve - One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Anne Heche stars as a recently-divorced mom who wants her two kids' first Christmas without dad to be perfect. An entertaining but unfortunate series of Christmas Eve mishaps ensures that won't happen.

programme.title: Love Always, Santa - Love Always, Santa
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After losing her husband 3 years ago, Celia never thought she'd fall in love again. Now, her world revolves around taking care of her daughter Lilly. Lilly writes a letter to Santa with one wish, for her mom to find love again.

programme.title: Christmas Festival of Ice - Christmas Festival of Ice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Emma sets out to save her town's beloved ice sculpture contest.

programme.title: Notes From the Heart Healer - Notes From the Heart Healer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When recently married Peyton finds herself a caregiver to an abandoned baby, it awakens a desire in her to be a mother. Husband King, however, is not so sure about starting a new family. The third installment The Note.

programme.title: November Christmas - November Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 With the support of his small town, a father's wish for his very sick daughter is realized. Stars Sam Elliott, John Corbett, and Sarah Paulson. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: One Christmas Eve - One Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Anne Heche stars as a recently-divorced mom who wants her two kids' first Christmas without dad to be perfect. An entertaining but unfortunate series of Christmas Eve mishaps ensures that won't happen.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 15 Colonel Maybourne visits O'Neill and claims to have a key to a cache of alien technology, but demands a presidential pardon in exchange for it. When SG-1 accompanies Maybourne to retrieve it, they find his intentions may not be all they seem.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 SG-1 discovers that Nirrti is mutating the inhabitants of an unexplored planet with a machine that rearranges their DNA. Captured in an attempt to stop her, O'Neill must find a way to escape before he and SG-1 are subjected to the same fate.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Disclosure
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 17 General Hammond and the Pentagon are forced to reveal the existence of the Stargate to other world governments. Senator Kinsey suggests that General Hammond be relieved of his command and that the civilian-run NID oversee the Stargate program.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Forsaken
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 18 SG-1 discovers three human survivors on an off-world planet who claim to be under attack by hostile aliens. While Carter helps repair the ship's computer, she learns that the survivors are hiding a secret…and things may not be all they seem.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Changeling
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 19 Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Memento
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 20 SG-1 accompanies the X-53 on its voyage into deep space. When the ship drops out of hyperspace, SG-1 is stranded with no means of getting back to Earth. Their only option lies in exploring a nearby planet where a Stargate is thought to be located.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Prophecy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 21 SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Full Circle
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 22 Daniel appears to O'Neill and alerts him that Anubis has located the Eye of Ra, an object of power hidden on Abydos. With Daniel's help, SG-1 find the Eye first. Determined to have it, Anubis threatens to destroy the planet unless they hand it over.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Infection
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 17 The team prepares for the worst as board a Wraith hive ship over Atlantis. They're surprised to find the Wraith crew in stasis when a malfunction on the hive ship releases the remaining crew… who have been cannibalizing one another for food.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Identity
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 18 When Dr. Jennifer Keller is observed behaving very strangely, extensive testing reveals nothing abnormal. But McKay’s investigation leads him to suspect that Dr. Keller and Neela Casol, a notorious criminal, have switched consciousnesses.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Vegas
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 19 In an alternate universe, Detective John Sheppard is with the Las Vegas Police Department and begins to investigate a strange series of murders believed to be the work of a bizarre serial killer. Has life changed or is this a dangerous Wraith plot?

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Enemy At The Gate
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 Puzzled over the hive ship's sudden departure, the team picks up a weak subspace signal in Wraith code. Once deciphered, their worst fears are realized. The Wraith message contains a familiar set of coordinates. The hive ship is on its way to Earth!

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Rising (Part 1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A new Stargate team, led by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy, where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy that feeds on human fear. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Rising (Part 2)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 A new Stargate team, led by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy, where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy. Part 2 of 2.
